metadata.title: CVE-2021-46339 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is an Assertion 'lit_is_valid_cesu8_string (string_p, string_size)'failed at /base/ecma-helpers-string.c(ecma_new_ecma_string_from_utf8) inJerryScript 3.0.0.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
